definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: Cryoglobulinemia in association with hypocomplementemia usually indicates presence of renal damage.
sentences.chinese: 冷球蛋白血癥並低補體血癥常有臨牀腎臟損害。

sentences.english: Other McAbs are IgG1 with a weak capacity of complement fixation.
sentences.chinese: 其它單抗結合補體能力很弱。

sentences.english: The complement system intervenes in several phases of the inflammatory process.
sentences.chinese: 補體系統干預了炎症過程的數條途徑。

sentences.english: Complement is an important component of innate immune system.
sentences.chinese: 補體是天然免疫系統的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Pentraxin 3 and complement cascade activation in the failure of arteriovenous fistula.
sentences.chinese: 動靜脈瘻失敗下的五聚素3和補體級聯活化。

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the effect of crude extract of Bupleurum smithii (B. smithii) on the complement system.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究柴胡粗提物對補體系統的作用。

sentences.english: In the complement fixation test, designs an appropriate complement medicinal preparation.
sentences.chinese: 在補體結合試驗中，設計一個恰當的補體劑最。

sentences.english: In the complement fixation test, designs an appropriate complement medicinal preparation.
sentences.chinese: 在補體結合試驗中，設計一個恰當的補體劑最。

sentences.english: Using complement-fixation techniques in isolation of antigens from monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 即“用補體結合技術從猴體分離抗體”。

sentences.english: The anti-complementary activity of those polysaccharides seems that related to their whole moieties.
sentences.chinese: 這些多糖的抗補體活性可能和整個大分子的結構有關。
